name: Dryad Village Ruins
description:
This encounter was originally intended to be part of a larger scenario, but I humbly submit this fragment as part of the Half-Assed Jam. Throw it into any forest-based scenario or campaign you choose. 

It pairs well with The Mossy Skeleton Encounter, which was part of the same abandoned scenario. It wasn't written to be used with the Antler Forest, but you could use it that way if you want.
